name: Dare Devil Derby 3D [PSX]
description: beat each floor by blasting all enemies (skull icon shows your progress). use WASD to move, CLICK to shoot, E to reload (bullet icon shows how many shots you have). win quickly to gain xp (number at the bottom). at 100 xp, you level up and chose a powerup: +1 LIFE if you have less than your max lives, +1 SHOT per reload, +1 MAX LIFE.
